controls.name: indexInBlock
controls.caption: First index in block
controls.description: First index of number in every block; can be 0..L-1, where L = block length.

controls.name: lengthInBlock
controls.caption: Length of copied part
controls.description:
Number of copied columns; can be 0..L-1, where L = block length.
0 values is special and means "copy until the last column": the actual block length of the result will be max(1,L−K), where K = first index in block above.
Note: if K≥L (incorrect values), the result will be filled by zeros.
